item.title: Roots of Computing, 1963
item.author: Thorsten Sideb0ard
item.description: Oh man, this is incredible, seriously best historic piece I’ve watched, with the origins of operating system methodoligies, and crazy typewriter I/O UX, pre-CRTs!
